name: AVAudioSession.SetActiveOptions
desc: Options that provide additional information about your app’s audio intentions upon session deactivation.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static var notifyOthersOnDeactivation: AVAudioSession.SetActiveOptions
items.desc: An option that indicates that the system should notify other apps that you’ve deactivated your app’s audio session.
